script.action: maincpu.pb@FF8033=0, maincpu.pw@FFF000=0, maincpu.pw@FFF200=0, maincpu.pw@FF34F6=0, maincpu.ow@009452=4E71, maincpu.od@009454=4E714E71

parameter.item: Story x H2h Sequence 00 or disable background in Character Select

cheat.comment: Change prior to the RAM check

cheat.desc: 0xFF80AC Game play Scenario - Single or versus

parameter.item: Black + Fanfare - DF loads Game Over then Crash 1E
Black FanFare - DF loads Game Over then Crash 26
Game Over is Red FanFare Fire No meter or sprites 28
Black Green Scream Theme DF loads char, select Crash 2A
Black Fanfare is FE DF no Crash 2C

cheat.comment: Values exceeding 05 will cause an Ending
Value is randomely assigned at character select
Flag - Used when exiting from a match

parameter.item: Enter a Guard State with intro audio 2E
Enter a Guard State with intro audio 38
Get-Hit State Opponent Dark Force A6
Get-Hit State Opponent Dark Force A7
Weird crouch state - hit is Crash 33
DF-Activation and Get-Hit is Fire A0
Freeze State - Hit is Crash AE
Get-thrown is Frozen State - Big Brunch B4
Get-Hit State - Some throws freeze BD
Get-Hit State is Chopped in Half D0
Undefined state - Green color WTF E4
